== About me ==

My name is Alexander Stellwag and I'm a 43 year old IT architect working for Deutsche Telekom in Germany. I've been using Linux since 1993. Currently I'm working as a cloud solution architect with main focus on OpenStack. We run all our cloud services on Ubuntu LTS.
